items.name: Addams Family Wiki
items.title: Addams Family Wiki
items.headline: Welcome to the Addams Family Wikia
items.desc: The Addams Family Wikia is a community site dedicated to the Addams Family classic TV series and franchise. If you are a fan of this series, or even if you're just curious about it, then this is the place for you! Come explore our content and help us expand this database... or join us in discussion about the characters, the episodes, or the series in general. All are welcome!
